selector.name: $.ajaxPrefilter()
selector.description: Handle custom Ajax options or modify existing options before each request is sent and before they are processed by $.ajax()

selector.name: $.ajaxSetup()
selector.description: Sets the default values for future AJAX requests

selector.name: $.ajaxTransport()
selector.description: Creates an object that handles the actual transmission of Ajax data

selector.name: $.get()
selector.description: Loads data from a server using an AJAX HTTP GET request

selector.name: $.getJSON()
selector.description: Loads JSON-encoded data from a server using a HTTP GET request

selector.name: $.parseJSON()
selector.description: Deprecated in version 3.0, use JSON.parse() instead. Takes a well-formed JSON string and returns the resulting JavaScript value

selector.name: $.getScript()
selector.description: Loads (and executes) a JavaScript from a server using an AJAX HTTP GET request

selector.name: $.param()
selector.description: Creates a serialized representation of an array or object (can be used as URL query string for AJAX requests)

selector.name: $.post()
selector.description: Loads data from a server using an AJAX HTTP POST request

selector.name: ajaxComplete()
selector.description: Specifies a function to run when the AJAX request completes

selector.name: ajaxError()
selector.description: Specifies a function to run when the AJAX request completes with an error

selector.name: ajaxSend()
selector.description: Specifies a function to run before the AJAX request is sent

selector.name: ajaxStart()
selector.description: Specifies a function to run when the first AJAX request begins

selector.name: ajaxStop()
selector.description: Specifies a function to run when all AJAX requests have completed

selector.name: ajaxSuccess()
selector.description: Specifies a function to run when an AJAX request completes successfully

selector.name: load()
selector.description: Loads data from a server and puts the returned data into the selected element

selector.name: serialize()
selector.description: Encodes a set of form elements as a string for submission

selector.name: serializeArray()
selector.description: Encodes a set of form elements as an array of names and values
